title: Why are the 'Avatar' movies so massive? Their success seems to defy conventional logic
description: They're not part of a vast, Marvel-style universe, and neither is a classic. So why are the "Avatar" movies so successful?
content: They're not part of a vast, Marvel-style universe, and neither is a classic. So why are the "Avatar" movies so successful?
